props.name: deploymentId
props.description: The name of your model deployment.

props.name: temperature
props.description: Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

props.name: maxTokens
props.description: The maximum number of tokens to generate. Requests can use up to 2,048 or 4,096 tokens shared between prompt and completion depending on the model. Don't set the value to maximum and leave some tokens for the input. (One token is roughly 4 characters for normal English text)

props.name: topP
props.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.

props.name: frequencyPenalty
props.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

props.name: presencePenalty
props.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the mode's likelihood to talk about new topics.

props.name: memoryKey
props.description: A memory key that will keep the chat history shared across runs and flows. Keep it empty to leave ChatGPT without memory of previous messages.

props.name: roles
props.description: Array of roles to specify more accurate response
